```lean4
theorem putnam_2018_a3 :
    IsGreatest
      {∑ i, Real.cos (3 * x i) | (x : Fin 10 → ℝ) (hx : ∑ i, Real.cos (x i) = 0)}
      (480 / 49) := by
  have step₁ : IsGreatest {∑ i, Real.cos (3 * x i) | (x : Fin 10 → ℝ) (hx : ∑ i, Real.cos (x i) = 0)} (480 / 49) := by
    have h : IsGreatest {∑ i, Real.cos (3 * x i) | (x : Fin 10 → ℝ) (hx : ∑ i, Real.cos (x i) = 0)} (480 / 49) := by
      constructor
      · -- Show that 480 / 49 is in the set
        use fun i => Real.pi / 2 + (2 * Real.pi * ↑i) / 10
        simp [Fin.sum_univ_succ, Real.cos_add, Real.cos_two_mul, Real.sin_two_mul, mul_assoc]
        <;> ring_nf
        <;> norm_num
        <;> field_simp <;> ring_nf <;> norm_num
        <;> simp_all [Real.cos_add, Real.cos_two_mul, Real.sin_two_mul, mul_assoc]
        <;> norm_num
        <;> rfl
      · -- Show that 480 / 49 is the greatest element in the set
        intro y hy
        rcases hy with ⟨x, hx⟩
        have h1 : ∑ i : Fin 10, Real.cos (3 * x i) ≤ 480 / 49 := by
          simp_all [Fin.sum_univ_succ]
          have h2 : ∑ i : Fin 10, Real.cos (x i) = 0 := by simp_all
          have h3 : ∑ i : Fin 10, Real.cos (3 * x i) ≤ 480 / 49 := by
            simp_all [Fin.sum_univ_succ, Real.cos_le_one]
            have h4 : ∀ i : Fin 10, Real.cos (3 * x i) ≤ 1 := by
              intro i
              exact Real.cos_le_one (3 * x i)
            have h5 : ∑ i : Fin 10, Real.cos (3 * x i) ≤ ∑ i : Fin 10, (1 : ℝ) := by
              apply Finset.sum_le_sum
              intro i _
              exact h4 i
            simp_all [Finset.sum_const] <;> norm_num at * <;> nlinarith
          exact h3
        exact h1
    exact h
  
  exact step₁
```

import Mathlib

open Real Nat Topology MeasureTheory
open scoped BigOperators

theorem putnam_2018_a3 :
    IsGreatest
      {∑ i, Real.cos (3 * x i) | (x : Fin 10 → ℝ) (hx : ∑ i, Real.cos (x i) = 0)}
      (480 / 49) := by
  have step₁ : IsGreatest {∑ i, Real.cos (3 * x i) | (x : Fin 10 → ℝ) (hx : ∑ i, Real.cos (x i) = 0)} (480 / 49) := by
    have h : IsGreatest {∑ i, Real.cos (3 * x i) | (x : Fin 10 → ℝ) (hx : ∑ i, Real.cos (x i) = 0)} (480 / 49) := by
      constructor
      · -- Show that 480 / 49 is in the set
        use fun i => Real.pi / 2 + (2 * Real.pi * ↑i) / 10
        simp [Fin.sum_univ_succ, Real.cos_add, Real.cos_two_mul, Real.sin_two_mul, mul_assoc]
        <;> ring_nf
        <;> norm_num
        <;> field_simp <;> ring_nf <;> norm_num
        <;> simp_all [Real.cos_add, Real.cos_two_mul, Real.sin_two_mul, mul_assoc]
        <;> norm_num
        <;> rfl
      · -- Show that 480 / 49 is the greatest element in the set
        intro y hy
        rcases hy with ⟨x, hx⟩
        have h1 : ∑ i : Fin 10, Real.cos (3 * x i) ≤ 480 / 49 := by
          simp_all [Fin.sum_univ_succ]
          have h2 : ∑ i : Fin 10, Real.cos (x i) = 0 := by simp_all
          have h3 : ∑ i : Fin 10, Real.cos (3 * x i) ≤ 480 / 49 := by
            simp_all [Fin.sum_univ_succ, Real.cos_le_one]
            have h4 : ∀ i : Fin 10, Real.cos (3 * x i) ≤ 1 := by
              intro i
              exact Real.cos_le_one (3 * x i)
            have h5 : ∑ i : Fin 10, Real.cos (3 * x i) ≤ ∑ i : Fin 10, (1 : ℝ) := by
              apply Finset.sum_le_sum
              intro i _
              exact h4 i
            simp_all [Finset.sum_const] <;> norm_num at * <;> nlinarith
          exact h3
        exact h1
    exact h
  
  exact step₁
